description: Attention all you autumn lovers out there! Are your senses tingling with anticipation for that Indian Summer day? If so, it's time to make some Apple Cider Mojito. This drink will remind us of caramel apples and crisp leaves in one sip.
name: Apple Cider Mojito
recipeIngredient: Mint, apple slices, and cinnamon sticks for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Fill 2 glasses with ice. Add the juice of half a lemon to each glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Fill 2 glasses with ice. Add the juice of half a lemon to each glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Divide the rum between the two glasses, then fill 3/4 of the way full with apple cider.
recipeInstructions.text: Divide the rum between the two glasses, then fill 3/4 of the way full with apple cider.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with mint, thyme, and a slice of apple.
